dict.acceptation: 下降；（力量、健康、品格、权力、价值等的）衰退；下倾；（人、生命等的）衰退期；
（道路、物体等）下倾；（太阳）落下；（在品格、价值上）降低；衰落，谢绝；

sent.orig: The decline of literature indicates the decline of a nation; thetwo keep in their downward tendency.
sent.trans: 文学的衰落表明一个民族的衰落。

sent.orig: Based on Arps decline equation, the nomogram of decline curve assay is developed.
sent.trans: 基于Arps递减方程，建立了衰减曲线分析的诺模图。

sent.orig: But, in general the Greek culture with the city and the decline of decline.
sent.trans: 但总的来看，希腊文化随着城邦的衰落而式微。

sent.orig: Under normal circumstances, overcapacity would lead to price and profit decline, which triggers investment decline.
sent.trans: 正常情况下，产能过剩可能会引起价格和利润下降，从而引发投资下降。

sent.orig: Not only serve, physical decline will lead to decline in the speed of response.
sent.trans: 不仅仅是发球，体能下降还会导致反应速度下降。
